content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Configuring the blocked PTR domain list When the domain in the PTR record of a sending IP address matches the blocked PTR domain list, Cloud Email Gateway Protection rejects email messages from this IP address.
